生命早期接触 PFAS：健康风险和母婴转运机制多氟烷基物质 (PFAS) 是一类因其疏水性、疏油性和稳定性而广泛用于消费品生产的化学品。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/PFAS-exposure-in-early-life-Health-risks-and-maternal-fetal-transport-mechanisms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/PFAS-exposure-in-early-life-Health-risks-and-maternal-fetal-transport-mechanisms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=244beefd-5704-4a4b-8621-b12065b4a6ec Mon, 24 Jun 2024 07:50:59 -0400 PFAS exposure in early life: Health risks and maternal-fetal transport mechanisms
昆士兰大学领导的项目旨在测试农村皮肤癌筛查的技术驱动解决方案昆士兰大学领导的一个项目将测试多种技术的组合，以提高澳大利亚地区和农村患者潜在致命皮肤癌的早期发现率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/UQ-led-project-to-test-technology-driven-solutions-for-rural-skin-cancer-screening.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/UQ-led-project-to-test-technology-driven-solutions-for-rural-skin-cancer-screening.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c3cfa370-25ed-47af-a0c0-b1a7e1809ca2 Mon, 24 Jun 2024 07:23:51 -0400 UQ-led project to test technology-driven solutions for rural skin cancer screening

间歇性禁食在治疗早期 2 型糖尿病方面优于传统药物研究表明，5:2间歇性空腹代餐饮食可以有效控制中国成人早期2型糖尿病患者的血糖水平并减轻体重。这种饮食干预在控制糖尿病和肥胖方面优于二甲双胍和恩格列净。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Intermittent-fasting-outperforms-traditional-drugs-in-managing-early-type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Intermittent-fasting-outperforms-traditional-drugs-in-managing-early-type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d367ea58-8bd3-47ac-b50c-123cb74735a0 Mon, 24 Jun 2024 00:31:00 -0400 Intermittent fasting outperforms traditional drugs in managing early type 2 diabetes
